info.description: API documentation for WhatsApp Bot SaaS (Modular Architecture)
info.title: WhatsApp Bot SaaS API

get.description: Get the current active shopping cart

post.description: Add a product to the shopping cart
Convert cart to order and initiate payment

delete.description: Remove all items from the cart
Remove a product from the shopping cart

put.description: Update the quantity of an item in the cart

get.description: Returns all clients with active subscription
Returns a single client by ID
Returns knowledge base data for a client
get.summary: Get Knowledge Base by Client ID

post.description: Adds knowledge base entry with flexible JSONB content. The 'content' field accepts any JSON structure. Examples: For FAQ use {"question":"...","answer":"..."}, for Product use {"name":"...","price":50000,"description":"...","stock":100}

parameters.description: Knowledge base data - content field accepts any JSON structure
parameters.name: data

post.description: Upload a receipt image, extract text using OCR, parse it, and create a transaction record
post.summary: Process receipt image and create transaction

get.description: Get list of orders for a client

post.description: Create a new order for a customer (admin only)

get.description: Get list of orders for a specific customer
Retrieve order and payment status by order number
Retrieve a specific order by its ID

put.description: Update order details like items, total amount, or admin notes

post.description: Admin manually confirms payment for an order

get.description: Retrieve transaction history for a specific client

post.description: Receive webhook events from WhatsApp Provider (WAHA/GreenAPI)

get.description: Generate QR code for WhatsApp authentication

post.description: Stop and start a WhatsApp session
Start a new WhatsApp session for a client

get.description: Check if WhatsApp session is connected

post.description: Configure webhook URL for receiving WhatsApp messages

get.description: Retrieve all workflows for a specific client

post.description: Create a new automation workflow for a client

get.description: Retrieve a specific workflow by its ID
Retrieve execution history for a specific workflow

type.description: faq, product, service, policy, or any custom type
